properties.name: path.kataGoPath
properties.description: path to the katago executable. e.g. 'file:///usr/local/bin/katago'.

properties.name: path.weightPath
properties.description: path to the katago weight file. e.g. 'file:///usr/local/Cellar/katago/1.11.0/share/katago/g170-b30c320x2-s4824661760-d1229536699.bin.gz'.

properties.name: path.configFilePath
properties.description: path to the katago configuration file. e.g. 'file:///Users/you/.katago/gtp_custom.cfg'.

properties.name: path.outputFileFolder
properties.description: folder for analyse result output. e.g. 'file:///Users/you/.katago/analyse_out/'.

properties.name: path.analyseInfoFolder
properties.description: folder for analyse info output. e.g. 'file:///Users/sang/.katago/analyse_info/'.
